doc.field: A: Mayra Peters-Quintero and Andy Stettner on Tuv Taam Labor Dispute; Oscar Palacios, Richard Greene, Melanie Kaye/Kantrowitz, Jeremy Burton / B: Primary Preview with Norm Fruchter, Andy Stettner, Brad Lander, Kathy Goldman; Jonathan Bowles on State Budget Crisis [2001-0171]

A: Mayra Peters-Quintero and Andy Stettner on Tuv Taam Labor Dispute; Oscar Palacios, Richard Greene, Melanie Kaye/Kantrowitz, Jeremy Burton / B: Primary Preview with Norm Fruchter, Andy Stettner, Brad Lander, Kathy Goldman; Jonathan Bowles on State Budget Crisis [2001-0171]

Melanie Kaye/Kantrowitz, Jeremy Burton and Richard Green on the 10th anniversary of the Crown Heights riots; Maira Peters-Quintero (PRLDEF attorney), Oscar Palacios (fired worker) and Arieh Lebowitz (Jewish Labor Committee) on the efforts to organize the workers at Tuv Taam in Brooklyn. Co-host, Nan Rubin. Mayoral Primary Show on the issues, with Kathy Goldman (CFRC), Andy Stettner (JFREJ), Norman Fruchter (Institute for Education andf Social Policy, NYU), Brad Lander (Fifth Avenue Committee and ANHD); the New York State Budget with Jonathan Bowls, Center for an Urban Future.
Original Format: Audio Cassette, Duration: 120 min.
